ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Inventory', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Quota'), ISPICKVAL(cgcloud__User_Policy__c, "None"), ISPICKVAL(cgcloud__Tour_Policy__c, "None"), ISPICKVAL(cgcloud__Customer_Policy__c, "None"), ISPICKVAL(cgcloud__Vehicle_Policy__c, "None") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: At least one of the User Policy, Customer Policy, Tour Policy or Vehicle Policy must be 'One'.
